text: Ashley Greene net worth and salary: Ashley Greene is an American actress and model who has a net worth of $8 million. Ashley Greene is probably best known for playing the role of Alice Cullen in the Twilight films based on the novels by Stephanie Meyer. She is good friends with her Twilight co-stars, Kellan Lutz and Jackson Rathbone. The three were friends before the filming of the series began. Greene was born on February 21, 1987 in Jacksonville, Florida.Her father Joe Greene was a U.S. Marine and now owns a concrete business. Her mother Michele works in insurance. Ashley originally intended to be a model however she was told that she was not tall enough at 5'5″ to be a runway model and should instead focus on commercials. She decided she wanted to be an actress after taking commercial and acting lessons. She soon appeared as a guest on such television shows, as Punk'd and Crossing Jordan. She landed her first major role of Alice Cullen in Twilight in 2008. She reprised her role in the sequels, The Twilight Saga: New Moon, The Twilight Saga: Eclipse, and The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 1 and Part 2. In 2010 she portrayed Michelle Burkham in the drama film Skateland, which premiered at the 2010 Sundance Film Festival. Greene posed for SoBe advertisements in Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Edition 2010, appearing nude with only a body painted bikini. Greene received a special award this year, "The Style Icon Award" at Hollywood Life's Young Hollywood Awards, and a PETA foundation for representing Avon and supporting the companies no testing on animals' policy. She married TV announcer Paul Khoury in July 2018.
